dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Shows the Kingdom of Naples, comprising southern Italy from Abruzzi to Calabria. From: Atlas novus, sive, Descriptio geographica totius orbis terrarum ... / Gerardi Mercatoris et I. Hondii. Amstelodami : Apud Henricum Hondium & Joannem Jansonium, 1638. Latin text on verso with caption title: Regnum neapolitanum; signature Xx. Historic Maps copy 2 is uncolored.
